Want To Join InterSTEM?

Looking to join our STEM community? We welcome everyone on our Discord!


INTERSTEM

Providing you the best STEM education!

Mission Statement

Founded by a group of high school students wanting to educate the public about the COVID-19 pandemic, InterSTEM is a non-profit organization that hopes to raise awareness about the relevance of STEM-related topics to the world. Functioning mainly online, this platform offers a tutoring service for students, updates readers about current news in STEM through articles and blog posts, and plans collaborative projects between high school and elementary students. Through the integration of science, technology, engineering, and mathematics, InterSTEM provides students of all backgrounds the opportunity to both explore and dive deeper into the world of STEM.

Chapters

Interested in starting a chapter in your city? Please fill out the form below or contact us at interstemplatform@gmail.com and we'll schedule you an interview!

Start a Chapter

Programs

Be part of our STEM community today!

Blogging

Become a writer to get your articles featured. New blog posts published every week!

Research

Be part of the research team to work with university professors and publish a research paper!

Tutoring

Sign up for free tutoring service on various STEM topics or become a tutor to help other students!

Curriculum Dev.

Design and develop curriculum and course contents & materials to be used by InterSTEM tutors!

Tech

Join the tech team to help manage the site and learn more about web development!

Editing

Work with blogging department to edit and manage weekly articles.

Publicity & Marketing

Publicize and outreach to other international regions to expand our STEM community.

Podcast

Check out our podcast series on Spotify, run by InterSTEM chapter boards!

InterSTEM is a wonderful opportunity for students of all ages to get involved in various aspects of STEM! Working with high school students across the world to create podcasts, write blog articles, and host STEM contests has been an incredible experience and taught me so many valuable lessons that will definitely benefit me in the future!

Ryan Liu CEO

InterSTEM is without a doubt the best non-profit organization in STEM. I feel very lucky to be able to work with brilliant peers from all around the world with similar interests and learn from one another. Working with the tech team has been a remarkable experience, not to mention the free tutoring service that I was more than impressed with.

Bian Lee CTO
